input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "PicturesOnGold"
Reference Product Name: "Miraculous Medal Pendant"
Reference Product Description:
This item is color lasered and is 100% guaranteed for a lifetime.
Item can be engraved with message, names, dates or monogram.
Engraving doesn't delay your shipment.
Available in Yellow Gold Plated & 14K Yellow or White Gold or 14K Rose Gold and Sterling Silver
Is a Chain Included? You can choose which chain to add to your order when checking out
Pendant Bail - fits up to 4mm chain. We can make bail larger, just let us know in the special instructions upon ordering

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='MHM Rose Locket Pendant with Miraculous Medal and Scapular Medal'
  - Name='Beveled Miraculous Medal - .75" - Pewter - By Bliss'
  - Name='Bliss Sterling Silver Miraculous Pendant Necklace for Men'
  - Name='Saint Gerard Necklace'
  - Name='Sterling Scalloped Miraculous Medal Necklace'
  - Name='Mini Miraculous Medal Necklace 14k Gold'
  - Name='Midi Miraculous Medal Necklace'
  - Name='Our Lady of La Leche Necklace Sterling Silver'
  - Name='14K Gold Filled Crucifix Necklace with Miraculous Medal'
  - Name='Custom Saint Necklace'
  - Name='Large Saint Necklace'
  - Name='Miraculous Medal Medallion Necklace'
  - Name='In Good Company Necklace'
  - Name='Build Your Own Sacred Heart Necklace Gold Filled / Sacred Heart + Miraculous Medal + Floral Cross'
  - Name='Stella Maris Disc Necklace Gold Filled'
  - Name='Stella Maris Necklace'
  - Name='Corpus Christi Necklace'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MHM Rose Locket Pendant with Miraculous Medal and Scapular Medal
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a locket pendant featuring a Miraculous Medal but also includes a Scapular Medal and a locket construction, making it a related but more complex item than a simple Miraculous Medal Pendant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Beveled Miraculous Medal - .75" - Pewter - By Bliss
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a standalone Miraculous Medal pendant similar to the reference, matching very closely in function, use, and silhouette, differing mainly in material.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bliss Sterling Silver Miraculous Pendant Necklace for Men
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a Miraculous Medal pendant in sterling silver, geared towards men, nearly identical in function and form to the reference product, except for potential size/style nuances.
While both are saint-related jewelry, this features Saint Gerard rather than the Miraculous Medal, differing significantly in religious symbolism and appeal.
A Miraculous Medal pendant necklace with a scalloped edge, highly similar to the reference product save for the decorative edging.
A mini version of a Miraculous Medal pendant in 14k gold; very closely aligned with the reference product, only the size appears different.
Similar Miraculous Medal pendant (mid-size), matching the reference in most respects except for size designation.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Our Lady of La Leche Necklace Sterling Silver
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a different depiction—Our Lady of La Leche rather than the Miraculous Medal—so function and audience are less aligned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 14K Gold Filled Crucifix Necklace with Miraculous Medal
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Contains a Miraculous Medal, but is combined with a crucifix, making it similar yet somewhat different in core focus and style.
A customizable saint necklace could be made to feature a Miraculous Medal, but is much broader in its product type and typically involves different construction or customer selections.
Focuses on saints in general, which could include but is not limited to the Miraculous Medal, so somewhat related, but broader and less directly comparable.
This is, based on the name, a Miraculous Medal pendant necklace, functionally and structurally identical to the reference product.
Name does not indicate any link to the Miraculous Medal or its core features, so relevancy is low.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Build Your Own Sacred Heart Necklace Gold Filled / Sacred Heart + Miraculous Medal + Floral Cross
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Offers a Miraculous Medal as part of a build-your-own multi-charm necklace; related but more complex and customizable than the single pendant reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Stella Maris Disc Necklace Gold Filled
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A different Marian devotion (Stella Maris), not the Miraculous Medal; main features and symbolism do not match.
Again, focused on Stella Maris, not the Miraculous Medal; limited overlap in core features.
Focuses on Corpus Christi imagery or symbolism, not the Miraculous Medal, meaning very low relevancy.
